title: World-Wide
text:
Seniors and others receiving Social Security benefits in 2022 will see the largest increase in their payments in four decades.

---

A booster of J&J's Covid-19 vaccine showed signs of significantly bolstering the immune defenses of study subjects, FDA staffers said.

---

The WHO established a new panel of scientists whose mandate will include attempting to revive a stalled inquiry into the origins of the novel coronavirus.

---

The Biden administration is preparing to open large sections of the U.S. coastline to wind-turbine projects as part of a plan to boost production of clean, renewable energy.

---

Supreme Court justices diverged sharply over the fairness of Boston Marathon bomber Dzhokhar Tsarnaev's death sentence.

---

At least five people were killed and two injured in the Norwegian town of Kongsberg by a man wielding a bow and arrows, local police said.
